article.headline: 'Vote him out!' President Trump booed during visit to RBG's casket
article.body: President Donald Trump and first lady Melania Trump pay their respects to Justice Ruth Bader Ginsburg's flag-draped casket. Alex Wong/Getty Images One of his adoring rallies this clearly was not. A masked President Donald Trump visited Ruth Bader Ginsburg's casket at the Supreme Court on Thursday, where he was promptly met with boos and chants of "vote him out" and "honor her wish." Here's some of the footage: iframe.twitter-tweet { width: 100% !important; } The "honor her wish" chant was in reference to Trump's overlooking of the late justice's reported dying wish to not be replaced before the election. iframe.twitter-tweet { width: 100% !important; } As video of the jeers was passed around social media, the #VoteHimOut hashtag became the top-trending topic on Twitter TWTR, -0.23% as the president was hammered by his critics: iframe.twitter-tweet { width: 100% !important; } White House Press Secretary Kayleigh McEnany said that the chants were "appalling" but not surprising, considering they came from "the heart of the swamp" in Washington D.C. "I travel with the president all across the country - Pennsylvania, North Carolina, Florida, Nevada - and everywhere we go the streets are lined with support like I don't think any other president has had," she said.
